channel.title: Server d/ces every1
channel.description:
Avengence Is Online Owner - Soft Co-Owner - Xufet Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 45 at NPCHandler.loadNPCDrops(NPCHandler.java:2050) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:110)
it says this whe i run and d/cs every1 who trys to log in
